caption.p: New day-to-day (in yellow) SARS-CoV-2 swab-positive patients (left panel), death cases (right panel) and moving average of healed individuals on a continuous 5-day basis (middle panel, in blue) as of April 18, 2020 (Source: Data from the Ministry of Health processed by the ISS, modified). [10] (For interpretation of the references to colour in this figure legend, the reader is referred to the web version of this article.)
